item.title: We wish you a Merry Christmas!
item.author: Luke Baldwin,
item.description: What part of Christmas do you look forward to most? The music, the gifts, the cheer…? Where to begin! Back when I was a lad, I lived in the far-off land of Ethiopia. And so it was that my first memorable experiences of Christmas were set in that amazing country. Christmas was always a time of â€¦
